Verses.3: Strive to keep the unity of the Spirit through the bond of peace.
Verses.4: There is one body and one Spirit. Just as you were called in one hope by your spiritual calling;
Verses.5: one Lord, one faith, one baptism,
Verses.6: one God, and Father of all. Who is over all, through all, and in all.
Verses.26: "If you become angry, do not sin."  Do not let the sun set while you are still angry,
Verses.27: and give no chance to the devil.
Verses.29: Do not let harmful words come from your mouths. For only a life giving word is needed in the moment. Speak that word for the benefit of all who hear it.
Verses.30: Do not grieve the Holy Spirit of God, by whom you have been sealed for the day of liberation.
Verses.31: Let go of all bitterness, wrath, anger, clamor, slander, and malice.
Verses.32: Be kind and tender with one another. Forgiving each other, just as God has forgiven us in Christ.

Changes: 2023-08-30 - Paul Prins: Smooth out translation of verses 26-27, 29
2022-08-12 - Paul Prins: First translation of verses 26-27, 29-32
2022-06-04 - Paul Prins: First translation of verses 3-6 based on Greek.
